title: Caves of Qud Directly Download
description: Caves of Qud is a science fantasy roguelike epic steeped in retrofuturism, deep simulation, and swathes of sentient plants. Come inhabit a living, breathing world and chisel through layers of thousand-year-old civilizations. Decide: is it a dying earth, or is it on the verge of rebirth ?

system_requirements.Processor: 1GHz or faster. SSE2 instruction set support.
